cause.description:
We Hold to the Augsburg Confession and the Writings of Martin Luther were he took his stand at the Diet of Worms when asked to recant what he had written, and also believe that the Bible is 100% truth with no error anywere in Holy Scripture and live ours lives to the Law and Gospel.
Everyone please list if you want which lutheran demonination you are so I can keep a tally on the site
1. Sola Gratia Sola Fide Sola Scriptura
cause.mission: Stand up for God's Word and Biblical Truth
cause.name: Confessional Lutheranism
